helpPages.title: To view photos in Recent pictures
helpPages.text: Select My pictures > Recent pictures.

helpPages.title: To view photos in Pictures I liked
helpPages.text: Select My pictures > Pictures I liked.

helpPages.title: To view photos of a specific family member
helpPages.text: Select the desired family member’s name under I want to see pictures from.

helpPages.title: To see the details of a picture of a specific family member
helpPages.text: Select My pictures > Pictures I liked, then select a photo.

helpPages.title: To like a photo, select My pictures
helpPages.text: Pictures I liked and select a photo. Select the heart icon.

helpPages.title: To view the details of people in the picture
helpPages.text: Select My pictures > Pictures I liked and select a photo. Under People in the picture, select a family member.

helpPages.title: To see more photos of the people in the picture
helpPages.text: Select My pictures > Pictures I liked, then select a photo. Under More pictures of, select a family member’s name.

helpPages.title: To add an agenda item
helpPages.text: Select the plus icon.

helpPages.title: Filling out the form
helpPages.text: Enter an agenda event in the Today I box.

helpPages.title: Selecting the people who accompanied me
helpPages.text: Select the family member from the drop down menu in the This was with field.

helpPages.title: Adding the agenda item
helpPages.text: Select the Add to agenda button.

helpPages.title: To view an individual family member’s profile
helpPages.text: Select the family member from the list.

helpPages.title: To view a family member’s photos
helpPages.text: Select Pictures from [family member’s name].

helpPages.title: To link a family member to a wish
helpPages.text: Select Ask [family member’s name] to bring something. You can also link a family member to a wish from the My wishlist page.

helpPages.title: To add a wish
helpPages.text: Select the plus icon.

helpPages.title: Filling out the form
helpPages.text: Select a name from the dropdown menu under Who do you want to bring it?

helpPages.title: Filling out the form
helpPages.text: Enter the desired items in the What do they need to bring? box.

helpPages.title: Filling out the form
helpPages.text: Select a date from the dropdown menu under When do they have to bring it?

helpPages.title: Adding the wishlist item
helpPages.text: Select Add to wishlist.

helpPages.title: To edit an item in your wishlist
helpPages.text: Select an item.

helpPages.title: Select Edit Wish
helpPages.text: Change any details in your wish, and select Save changes.

helpPages.title: To delete a wish
helpPages.text: Select the desired wish, then select Delete wish.
